name: Stamp Inventory
altText: A data table with white background and black text, showing the name of each stamp part and it's current available quantity
description: A site created to show the current inventory for self-inking stamp supplies. Using a Google Spreadsheet as the database, the user can use a form to update when supplies are used or received. If an item falls below the quantity threshold, the background of that box will turn red.
tech: HTML, CSS, JS, Google Sheets API
